price: [Ante Dios] es igual que digan algo en secreto o en público, que se oculten de noche o se muestren de día.
arabic: سَوَآءٞ مِّنكُم مَّنۡ أَسَرَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ وَمَن جَهَرَ بِهِۦ وَمَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡتَخۡفِۭ بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَسَارِبُۢ بِٱلنَّهَارِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: sawāon minkum man asarra al-qawla waman jahara bihi waman huwa mus'takhfin bi-al-layli wasāribun bil-nahāri
